item.title: Videographer & editor in Nepal - Upwork
item.description:
We are a holistic wellness startup and we're looking to hire a videographer and editor to take some shots and edit it later on.

if done well, this can be an ongoing project. Do not hesitate to get in touch asap.

Hourly Range: $7.00-$13.00

item.title: EXPERIENCED Faceless YouTube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hello!

I have another position open for a video editor for my Rap YouTube Channel.

Please watch this video: (link removed)

Requirements:
- 8 Minute Long Video (Ends as close to 8:00 as possible)
- Documentary Style
- Clips Switch Every 1-2 Seconds (MAX)
- Lots of Sound Effects
- Cinematic Transitions (Not Cheesy)
- Smooth Clips (No Stutter / Glitching)
- Highly Engaging Clips With Lots of Movement
- Clips Synced To Voice Over
- Always use slow zoom in on clips that are stationary (interview clips, etc)

Instructions:
- Pick out highly engaging clips of the rapper facing and rapping towards the screen with lots of hand movements
- Get clips from Rapper Music Videos
- Don't use the same music video back to back
- Film burn transition at the end of every sentence
- Zoom in transition at a pause (in the middle of a sentence)
- Switch clips every 1-2 seconds synced to the voice-over

DO NOT APPLY IF YOU CANNOT FOLLOW INSTRUCTIONS AND USE SAME VIDEO ASSETS.

Watch these tutorials:  (link removed)

You must create a 1-minute sample. I do not tolerate flakiness so if you are flaky you are instantly fired.

Pay per video: $40 (1 video per day)

Type "Y,T,R,A,P" without the commas so I know you have fully read and understood the requirements when applying to this job post.

Thanks.


Posted On: June 29, 2024 03:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, Audio Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, Audio Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Short form video editor - Upwork
item.description:
I need a video editor who will bring my video ideas to life. What this will entail is finding clips, audio's, ai voiceovers, and any other editing styles to create what I need.

I want someone who is ambitious, willing to learn, and creative. I do not want to hold your hand. I want you to be passionate about creating the best content with me.


Posted On: June 29, 2024 02:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, YouTube Shorts, Short Video Ad, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, YouTube, Social Media Content, YouTube Video, Video Editing & Production, Video Production, Podcast Production, Podcast Editing

item.title: Looking for someone to shoot a 1-2 hour interview in Fort Wayne Indiana - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone to film a 1-2 hour interview for a video game documentary. Need someone with a camera that shoots 4K, has pro sound capability and a knowledge of interviews. No editing, just sending footage.

Budget: $150
